citations.narrative:
Several water tubs (2 raccoons, 2 foxes, 2 camels, 5 pigs) held dirty and contaminated water as the only source of water
in the pen. The water was cloudy with floating algae, debris and/or large amounts of fecal material. Slime and debris were
present on sides and bottom of containers. Contaminated water can be unpalatable and unhealthy for the animals
causing illness and distress. All water containers must be kept clean and sanitary.
To be corrected by 8/5/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.130 
   
Watering. 
Several water tubs (2 raccoons, 2 foxes, 2 camels, 5 pigs) held dirty and contaminated water as the only source of water 
in the pen. The water was cloudy with floating algae, debris and/or large amounts of fecal material. Slime and debris were 
present on sides and bottom of containers. Contaminated water can be unpalatable and unhealthy for the animals 
causing illness and distress. All water containers must be kept clean and sanitary. 
To be corrected by 8/5/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
